name: Roasted Garlic and Orange Guacamole
description: The recipe includes roasted garlic, which adds a beautiful smokiness to it. It's smoky and creamy and so delicious.

recipeInstructions.text: Set your oven broiler on high.
recipeInstructions.name: Set your oven broiler on high.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a sheet tray with foil or parchment paper and place the garlic, sliced onion, and Serrano peppers on it.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a sheet tray with foil or parchment paper and place the garlic, sliced onion, and Serrano peppers on it.

recipeInstructions.text: Place under broiler for 7 min. Remove the garlic from the oven and set aside. Flip the peppers and toss the onion so it chars evenly. Return to oven for 5 -7 more minutes or until the peppers and onion are charred, but not burnt. Chop the onion and peppers and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Place under broiler for 7 min. Remove the garlic from the oven and set aside. Flip the peppers and toss the onion so it chars evenly. Return to oven for 5 -7 more minutes or until the peppers and onion are charred, but not burnt. Chop the onion and peppers and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel garlic and place in a molcajete, mortar and pestle or you can use your knife to turn the garlic into a paste.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel garlic and place in a molcajete, mortar and pestle or you can use your knife to turn the garlic into a paste.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the garlic paste in a large bowl and add the chopped pepper and onion, avocado, and chopped cilantro. Mash with a potato masher to the desired consistency (I like mine chunky).
recipeInstructions.name: Place the garlic paste in a large bowl and add the chopped pepper and onion, avocado, and chopped cilantro. Mash with a potato masher to the desired consistency (I like mine chunky).

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper and lime juice to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with salt and pepper and lime juice to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the orange supremes in half and fold them into the guacamole. Serve with your favorite chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the orange supremes in half and fold them into the guacamole. Serve with your favorite chips.

keywords: garlic guacamole, orange guacamole, roasted garlic
